title: How to download the audiobook for 'Sophie's World' by Jostein Gaarder for free - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are in the US, get a library card through your local library. They are issuing ecards during the pandemic. The library will have an app you need to download such as Libby, Overdrive, Cloud Library or Hoopla. You can download it to your phone or device. After you designate whether you want ebooks or audiobooks then designate how long you want to check out an item, you can start borrowing items.
